dialog.title: Delete group
dialog.content:
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
If you only want to leave the group, then you could transfer your ownership to another member and then leave the group.

demo.title: Demo mode
demo.info:
Try mygroupcar.de out

We prepared a user account for you that you can log into, as well as a few groups on which you can try out some functionalities. The demo mode is running on your local device. All changes you make are stored and will be deleted once you close the browser window.

Because the website isn't running in its usual environment, there may occur some weird bugs. Additionally, not every functionality of the real website is supported. For example, it is not possible to create a new account or to change the password of your demo user account.
